meanings.definition: The highest point or peak of something.
meanings.sent1: Reaching the acme of the mountain was a challenging but rewarding experience.
meanings.sent2: The acme of her career was when she won the prestigious award.
meanings.sent3: At the acme of the roller coaster, she couldn't help but scream with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The acme of the tree reached high into the sky, touching the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The acme of the fireworks display was the grand finale that lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: The point at which someone or something is best, perfect, or most successful.
meanings.sent1: For him, winning the championship was the acme of his athletic career.
meanings.sent2: The acme of customer service is providing personalized attention to each client.
meanings.sent3: The acme of her baking skills was when she created the perfect souffle.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, the acme of fashion was wearing a designer gown to the gala.
meanings.sent5: The acme of the concert was when the singer hit the high note flawlessly.
